name: Uchuu Seibutsu Flopon-kun P!
overview: Uchuu Seibutsu Flopon-kun P! is an enhanced version of the 3DO game Trip'd. The game feature a story mode and a vs mode. In the story mode the player controls a young boy that have to defeat different aliens during different rounds. The gameplay is about matching different shape pieces and make combinations with 4 of them, if the player join 4 pieces (2 under 2 pieces) create an alien that have to be removed with the join of other 4 pieces (not in a square form).
